page.title: 10ATTITUDES - STRANRAER
page.content: There are many topics that the people of Stranraer feel strongly about. To generalise however, a cross section of the population felt that:- a) Generally,{amenities}and{services were adequate, although there is a need for{improved train}and{bus {services. b) There should be{more}playgrounds and recreational facilities for both children and adults. One of the major public issues in 1985 is the lack of a {public swimming pool}or{sports centre. c) The council should be doing more to attract{modern technological {industries}to the town. d) The town needs a{modern hospital and{shopping centre.}In 1985, it is necessary to travel over fifty miles before reaching a large shopping centre or large general hospital i.e. Ayr, Dumfries or Glasgow.
